actionTemplate.title: Tang Butterfly Lip C (Elongated)
steps: Neutralize the lips while keeping a guide at the center
Widen the butterfly peaks horizontally for a longer shape
Extend the lower lip sideways but keep it thinner overall
Fill and softly blur the edge to avoid stiffness

rationaleTemplate: A wider silhouette elongates the mouth in close-ups.
Softer than the sharp version, so it suits more faces.
